settings_popup-position_description.message: If several rules are matching, only the first applies. Default values only apply if no rule is matching.

settings_popup-rule_applies_format.message:
Single domain
www.google.com

Multiple domains
google.com,www.google.com

Domain + all subdomains
google.com,*.google.com

RegExp
/[\/\.](google|youtube)\.com/i

settings_popup-position_domain_descripti.message: Entries without a subdomain (e.g. www) also apply to all of its subdomains. Multiple domains can be used by separating the entries with a comma (,). Example value: github.com,www.google.com
